TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void WebPartConnectionsEventHandler(object sender, WebPartConnectionsEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed WebPartConnectionsEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: Um que contém os dados do evento.
Docs.summary: Representa o método que manipulará o e eventos o controle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventHandler> classe define um delegado de manipulador para dois eventos que ocorrem no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> controle: o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento e o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento. O método que manipula o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsConnected> evento é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsConnected%2A> método. O método que manipula o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.WebPartsDisconnected> evento é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.OnWebPartsDisconnected%2A> método. Em ambos os casos, os dados de evento são contidos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartConnectionsEventArgs> objeto.
